name: collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<collections::btree::node::marker::Mut<'a>, K, V, collections::btree::node::marker::Internal>::as_internal_mut

collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<Borr.doc:
Exposes the data of an internal node.

 Returns a raw ptr to avoid invalidating other references to this node.

doc: Borrows exclusive access to the data of an internal node.
